publisher.value: National Resource Center for EHR Standards

description.value: This Value Set covers: Clinical Drugs from SNOMED CT International Edition, Clinical Drugs and Branded Medicines (Real Clinical Drugs) from Common Drug Codes for India (National Extension). For more information refer: [https://www.nrces.in/services/national-releases](https://www.nrces.in/services/national-releases)
